CONTENT: しまむらチョコレート しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura... Chocolate. Shimamura...

CONTENT: 手作りは重いかな料理経験ないし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede que casero sea pasarme... Nunca he hecho uno antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Homemade... is probably a bit heavy. I've never cooked before, anyway.

CONTENT: やっぱり チョコは売っているやつで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll just buy one.

CONTENT: 2月14日は しまむらとどこかへ遊びに行って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El 14 de febrero voy a salir con Shimamura
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: On February 14th, I was going to go somewhere with Shimamura

CONTENT: そして チョコレート交換
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: and exchange chocolates with her.

CONTENT: 《しまむら...》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura...

CONTENT: 何はともあれ好みとか聞かないと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De todas formas, tengo que preguntarle qué le gusta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, I need to ask her what she likes.

CONTENT: 絶対に後悔しないように
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que evitar arrepentirme de nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I need to make sure I don't regret anything.

CONTENT: 次は恋愛星座占いコーナーです
シャーマン田岡のー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This is Shaman Taoka's...

CONTENT: 恋愛星座占いだー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Y este es mi horóscopo del amor!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...Romance horoscopes!

CONTENT: 今日も 君のあなたの恋愛運を占ってみせよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hoy estoy aquí para deciros la suerte que tendréis en el amor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm here to tell you all about your romance luck again today!

CONTENT: さてと うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Now, then...

CONTENT: 樽見?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tarumi?

CONTENT: 《帰ったら かけるね》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te llamo cuando llegue a casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll give you a call when I get home.

CONTENT: 天秤座は恋の波乱の予感
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Presiento que los libras lo van a tener difícil.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see some rough times ahead for the Libras today.

CONTENT: 周囲への監視を忘れるな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Make sure you're aware of your surroundings!

CONTENT: 今日のキーワードはDー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La letra de la suerte de hoy es... ¡la D!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Today's lucky letter is... D!

CONTENT: 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi?

CONTENT: えっと 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, what's up?

CONTENT: 何かほしいの?　ミルクティー? パン?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you want something? Like milk tea or bread?

CONTENT: あ... 大丈夫
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm fine.

CONTENT: えっと しまむらって星座は何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say... what's your sign, Shimamura?

CONTENT: 星座?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My sign?

CONTENT: 何座になるのかな　4月生まれだけど あっ 10日ね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No estoy segura. Nací en abril... sí, el diez de abril.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure. I was born in April... Oh, April 10th.

CONTENT: ってことは 牡羊座
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Which means she's an Aries.

CONTENT: しまむらが牡羊座だとすると　私の天秤座とは相性が最悪だったはず
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si es Aries, nuestra compatibilidad es horrible porque yo soy Libra.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If she's an Aries, I think our compatibility sucks, since I'm a Libra.

CONTENT: いや それはない!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, that can't be true!

CONTENT: 相性が最悪の相手と仲良くなりたいなんて思うはずがない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No quiero acercarme a alguien si no somos compatibles. No creo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: There's no way I'd want to get closer to someone who's not compatible... I don't think...

CONTENT: ないけど...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No way...

CONTENT: 安達? おーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi? Hello?

CONTENT: でも 何で星座なんて聞いたの?　星占いみたいなやつ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué quieres saber mi signo? ¿Te va la astrología?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why did you want to know my sign, anyway? Are you into astrology?

CONTENT: あっ 次...次の授業の準備 準備しないと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, creo que ya es hora de prepararnos para la siguiente clase...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I, uh... I need to get ready for our next class...

CONTENT: 準備って えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Get ready? What?

CONTENT: でも とりあえずしまむらの誕生日はゲットできた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos he averiguado la fecha de su cumpleaños.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, at least I managed to find out when Shimamura's birthday is.

CONTENT: しまむら!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura!

CONTENT: しまむら 待って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura, wait!

CONTENT: どうした? 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's up, Adachi?

CONTENT: えっと その...しまむらってどんなチョコが好きかなって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Oye, ¿qué tipo de chocolate te gusta?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, um... What kind of chocolate do you like?

CONTENT: えっ チョコ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Chocolate?

CONTENT: そう チョコ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, chocolate.

CONTENT: えっと ミルク系のとか好きかも　食べやすいし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues me encanta el chocolate con leche. Es delicioso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's see... I think I'm a fan of milk chocolate. It goes down better.

CONTENT: そうなんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see.

CONTENT: それだけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Was that it?

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: 安達　うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi?

CONTENT: 自転車は?　あっ!忘れてた!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What about your bike? I forgot!

CONTENT: イタッ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bam, tap, bam, tap, bam, ow!

CONTENT: うっ... 天秤座
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Libras...

CONTENT: 髪形を変えて意中の相手に別の魅力をアピール
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cambiaos el peinado para llamar la atención de vuestros crush.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Change up your hairstyle to really grab your crush's attention.

CONTENT: キーワードはAー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La letra de la suerte de hoy es la A.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Today's lucky letter is A.

CONTENT: あー いたいた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, there you are.

CONTENT: 一緒にお昼ご飯食べない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, wanna have lunch together?

CONTENT: 何それ 全部チョコ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, is that all chocolate?

CONTENT: あれかな 勉強で頭使いすぎて糖分補給みたいな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Tanto te has dejado la cabeza estudiando que necesitas esa energía?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you, like, use your head too much studying that you need the extra carbs?

CONTENT: そ...そういうのだと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah, I think that's it.

CONTENT: これ かわいいじゃん　ポニーテール　いつもの安達もいいけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Te queda bien la coleta, aunque creo que me gustas como de costumbre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, your ponytail's cute. Though I like you just the way you are usually.

CONTENT: い... い... いつもの!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-U... Usually?!

CONTENT: あ... 安達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A-Adachi?

CONTENT: おーい チョコレートー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello? Your chocolate?

CONTENT: ミルクチョコレートかあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Milk chocolate, eh?

CONTENT: いつもの安達もいいけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: \"Aunque creo que me gustas como de costumbre\".
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Though I like you just the way you are usually.\"

CONTENT: 言いたいことははっきり伝えておこう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Say how you really feel today.

CONTENT: いつ死ぬか分からない... しね!　しねー しねー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A sabes cuándo la palmaréis. ¡Morid, morid, morid!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You never know when you're gonna die. Die! Die! Die!

CONTENT: 私は しまむらと出会って前向きになった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Después de conocer a Shimamura, me volví mucho más positiva.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I became a lot more positive after meeting Shimamura.

CONTENT: むしろ前のめりに倒れそうだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estoy tan positiva que voy a explotar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Actually, I'm so positive that I'm about to burst,

CONTENT: 毎日が明るくなったのは事実だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque es cierto que mis días brillan más.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but my days are now brighter, nonetheless.

CONTENT: だから 改めて感謝の気持ちを伝えよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso quiero decirle lo mucho que la aprecio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's why I want to tell her how much I appreciate her.

CONTENT: しまむらは 私の太陽だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura is my sun.

CONTENT: お... おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: G-Good morning.

CONTENT: おはよう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Morning...

CONTENT: うん? 何か用事あり?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you need something?

CONTENT: あ... いや　その...ちょっと太陽のことで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No, es que... solo quería hablar del sol...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, I just, um... wanted to talk about the sun...

CONTENT: はっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?

CONTENT: そこじゃない 感謝
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, not that part! You wanted to show gratitude.

CONTENT: ええと 感謝 感謝は
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Gratitude, gratitude, how do I show gratitude?

CONTENT: あ... ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Th-Thank you...

CONTENT: えっ? いや そんなお礼を言われるほどでも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eh? ¿Por qué? No he hecho nada para que me las des...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Wait, what? I didn't do anything to get thanked... Wait, what?

CONTENT: そういうわけで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, yeah.

CONTENT: 明るくなったというよりバカになった気がした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No estoy segura de si soy más positiva o más tonta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm not sure if I became more positive or just stupider.

CONTENT: 天秤座のあなたは はよ手作りチョコを作って渡せばいい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Libras: daos prisa y entregad vuestro chocolate casero.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Libras out there, make sure you hurry up and give them your homemade chocolate.

CONTENT: そうしろ キーワードはCだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¡Hacedlo! ¡La letra de la suerte de hoy es la C!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Do it! Your lucky letter today is C!

CONTENT: これは チョコレート?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this... Chocolate?

CONTENT: どうって...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: \"Well?\" \"Well?\"

CONTENT: うーん めんどい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What a pain.

CONTENT: 私だってこんなの送られたら困る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hasta yo estaría rara si alguien me mandase esto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Even I'd feel awkward if someone sent this to me.

CONTENT: しまむらに喜んでほしい　私を特別に思ってほしい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo quiero que Shimamura sea feliz. Quiero que piense que soy especial.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want Shimamura to be happy. I want her to think I'm special.

CONTENT: 望みと願いは山脈のように高く遠く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El montón de mis deseos acumulados es tan alto como una montaña,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My wishes and desires kept piling up far and high like mountain ranges,

CONTENT: 私の目の前に広がるのはどこまでも荒野だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero lo que veía delante de mí era un páramo sin fin.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but what I was seeing before me was an endless wasteland.

CONTENT: 何もしない方が おいしかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estaba mejor antes de haberla liado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It was better off before I messed with it.

CONTENT: 樽見
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tarumi...

CONTENT: もしもし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello?

CONTENT: あっ しまちゃん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Shima?

CONTENT: うん そう しまちゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup, that's me.

CONTENT: ごめん　着信あったのに かけ直さないで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Siento no haberte devuelto la llamada antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry I didn't call you back earlier.

CONTENT: いいの いいの　小学校以来だしね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tranquila. No hemos hablado desde primaria.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it's fine. We haven't talked since grade school.

CONTENT: あのさ　うん?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey.

CONTENT: この間言い忘れたことがあったんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: El otro día olvidé decirte una cosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I forgot to mention this the other day.

CONTENT: 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: 久しぶりに会えて 嬉しかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me puse muy contenta por haberte vuelto a ver.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I was really happy to see you again.

CONTENT: あと... そんだけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Also... That's it.

CONTENT: そんだけって 嬉しいか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's it? Happy, huh?

CONTENT: うーんと 悪くないかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm... I guess I don't mind that.

CONTENT: おおっ すげえ髪　えっ 驚くのそこ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, qué pelazo. ¿Eso es lo que te sorprende?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow, look at that hair. That's what shocks you?

CONTENT: しまむらさん映画を見に行きましょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Shimamura, vamos a ver una peli.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura, let's go see a movie.

CONTENT: えー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What?

CONTENT: いが!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's go!

CONTENT: 2人で行ったら?　姉ちゃんは勉強とか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué no vais vosotras? Yo tengo que estudiar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why don't you two go? I've gotta study.

CONTENT: ついて行ってやりなさい　ついでにお昼ご飯 食べさせてきて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ve con ellas y asegúrate de que comen algo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Go with them. And make sure they get some lunch.

CONTENT: さあ 行きましょう さあ 行こう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's go!

CONTENT: 引率の先生みてえなのがいるなーって思ってたら しまむーじゃんか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creía que eras una profe con sus niñas, pero ya veo que eres tú, Shimamu.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I thought I spotted some teacher with some kids, but it's Shimamu!

CONTENT: 日野 何? その格好
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hino... Why are you dressed like that?

CONTENT: 家の用事の帰りだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just got back from some family business.

CONTENT: 姉ちゃんの友達?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is she your friend?

CONTENT: まあね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: 日野さんでしたかお久しぶりです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, Hino. It's been a while.

CONTENT: へっ? えっとどちら様 まっ いっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Eh? ¿Y tú quién eres? Bueno, da igual.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Um... Who might you be? Well, whatever.

CONTENT: で 今日は ちんちくりんどもを連れて 家族サービスか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Veo que las has sacado para aprovechar los descuentos de familia.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So I guess you've been dragging the runts around today on a family discount.

CONTENT: 映画を見に来ましたー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We went to see a movie!

CONTENT: あっ 永藤は?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, where's Nagafuji?

CONTENT: 休みまで一緒じゃねえよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No quedamos en los días libres.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We don't hang out on our days off, too.

CONTENT: まあ でも帰りにチョコでも買っていくかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que voy a comprar chocolate de camino a casa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Though maybe I'll go buy some chocolate on my way home.

CONTENT: 永藤にあげるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Se lo vas a dar a Nagafuji?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you giving some to Nagafuji?

CONTENT: あげるっていうかその場で一緒に食べて終わり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, se lo daré y nos lo comeremos en cuanto lo haga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, it's more like I'll give it to her and we'll both eat it on the spot.

CONTENT: 毎年 そんな感じ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We do that every year.

CONTENT: 何で永藤にチョコ買うの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh... So, why do you buy Nagafuji chocolate?

CONTENT: 何でって 永藤が喜ぶから?　チョコ好きだし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué? Quizás porque le hace feliz y a las dos nos gusta el chocolate.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why? Because it makes Nagafuji happy? And we both like chocolate.

CONTENT: そんなもんだよね女の子同士のバレンタインなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Supongo que hay chicas que celebran San Valentín juntas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess that's all there is to a girls' Valentine's together.

CONTENT: 安達は気負いすぎというかテンション高すぎというか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi tiene muchas ganas... y está muy emocionada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi's way too eager... And she's too excited.

CONTENT: もしかしたら私も安達もバレンタインを　大げさに考えすぎているのかもしれない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Puede que nos estemos preocupando demasiado por San Valentín.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe we're both overthinking Valentine's Day way too much.

CONTENT: 運命の王子様との
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You and your destined prince...

CONTENT: 触れ合いにドキドキ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: ...have an exciting encounter!

CONTENT: 安達ー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi!

CONTENT: ゲームするんだけど一緒に永藤の家に行かない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vamos a jugar a unos juegos, ¿te vienes a casa de Nagafuji?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're gonna play some games. Wanna go to Nagafuji's house with us?

CONTENT: 今から?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Right now?

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah.

CONTENT: ゲームって私 よく知らないんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero no sé mucho de juegos...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't know much about games, though...

CONTENT: そっか 無理にとは言わないけどね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. Bueno, no voy a obligarte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. Well, I'm not going to twist your arm.

CONTENT: いいや やっぱり行く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, wait. I'll go.

CONTENT: よっしゃ メンツ揃ったー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bien, se apunta toda la banda.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: All right! The gang's all here!

CONTENT: いいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you sure?

CONTENT: う... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yeah...

CONTENT: また6スタートダッシュ成功だね 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Otro seis. Estás empezando muy bien, Adachi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Another six. Looks like you're off to a great start, Adachi.

CONTENT: それじゃ 私の番ね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Guess it's my turn... now!

CONTENT: あっ...2かあー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A two...

CONTENT: おめえはおっぱい潰してればいいの よっと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vais a tener que rascaros un poco el bolsillo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You just need to keep squishing your boobs. Hup.

CONTENT: いいじゃん いいじゃんよっとっと ヘヘ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Nice, nice! Hup...

CONTENT: よーし 行くぞ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, here I go.

CONTENT: えー 1!? もうー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? A one? Ugh!

CONTENT: はーい コロッケ揚がったよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Here you go. Have some fresh croquettes.

CONTENT: やったぜ! おばさん大好きー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heck yeah! Love you, Auntie!

CONTENT: 今日は にぎやかね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It sure is lively today.

CONTENT: 日野ちゃん今 どこにいるのかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A saber a dónde irá Hino... Cállate.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder where Hino went off to... Shuffup.

CONTENT: 北海道って どうすんだよー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What am I supposed to do in Hokkaido?

CONTENT: えー 私 沖縄だよゴール 名古屋だよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué? He caído en Okinawa. La meta está en Nagoya, ¿no?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What? I got Okinawa. The goal is Nagoya, isn't it?

CONTENT: あー また1だあー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let's see... Dang it, I got a one again.

CONTENT: ほら あだちっち
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Come on, Adachicchi.

CONTENT: ゴールまで あと4つだよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estás a cuatro casillas de la meta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're only four spaces from the goal.

CONTENT: えっ マジ!?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For real?

CONTENT: 4だよ 頑張ってね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo te hace falta un cuatro. Ánimo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You need a four. You've got this.

CONTENT: う... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: O-Okay...

CONTENT: 4出た
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I got a four.

CONTENT: あーあ 最初は あだっちかよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Aw, the first one in's Adacchi?

CONTENT: やったね 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Way to go, Adachi.

CONTENT: あっ じゃあ私がビリじゃーん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso significa que he quedado la última.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait. That means I'm in last place!

CONTENT: 最後までしまむらが最下位だったね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Has ido la última toda la partida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You were in last place until the end.

CONTENT: 性格悪いヤツが強いらしいから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La gente con mala personalidad es buena en esto,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Only people with bad personalities are good at this game,

CONTENT: しまむらはきっと いいヤツなんだなー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: así que tú debes de ser una gran persona, Shimamura.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so I guess you're a great person, Shimamura.

CONTENT: しまむらは 性格いいと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Yo creo que eres una gran persona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I do think you're a great person.

CONTENT: ありがとうよさあっ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks...

CONTENT: 続きは またな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We can play again some other time.

CONTENT: 気をつけてね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Be careful getting home!

CONTENT: 安達も そこそこ楽しめた?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you at least have some fun, Adachi?

CONTENT: えっと... うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Yeah.

CONTENT: そっか っていうか前にも こんなこと聞いたな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ya veo. De hecho, creo que ya te lo había pedido antes.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see. Actually, I think I asked you this before, too.

CONTENT: あ... あの送っていこうか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um, want me to give you a ride home?

CONTENT: 遠回りになるけど いいの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para ti es un desvío. ¿Estás segura?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It'd be really out of the way. Are you sure?

CONTENT: しかし 安達　えっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But you know, Adachi...

CONTENT: 君は初期と随分 性格が違うなあ　あっ い... 言わないで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estás muy distinta a cuando nos conocimos. No digas eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You seem way different from when we first met. D-Don't say that.

CONTENT: あっという間に 時がたって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Time passes by so quickly.

CONTENT: 普段とあまりに異なる時の流れの中に翻弄されるばかりだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo me estoy dejando llevar por este tiempo tan diferente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm just being trifled with in this completely different flow of time.

CONTENT: あの しまむら　んー?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... Shimamura.

CONTENT: えっと 3日後の
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, in three days...

CONTENT: 忘れてないよ チョコレートね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No se me ha olvidado el chocolate.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I haven't forgotten about the chocolate.

CONTENT: うん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah!

CONTENT: ちょっ 安達 前見て!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hey, Adachi! Eyes up front!
S-Sorry!

CONTENT: 私の時間はきっと しまむらに盗まれている
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Estoy segura de que Shimamura me está robando el tiempo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm pretty sure Shimamura is stealing my time.

CONTENT: でも その時間は今までの色のない時間と異なり
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero ese tiempo, al contrario de los días oscuros que he vivido,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But that time, unlike the colorless days I've spent,

CONTENT: 宝石みたいに 光を帯びていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: brilla como si fuera una joya preciosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: is so filled with light, just like a jewel.

CONTENT: いっちにー いっちにー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One, two! One, two!

CONTENT: やばい ギリギリだなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Maldita sea, creo que no voy a llegar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Crap... I might not make it.

CONTENT: いっちにー いっちにー いっちにー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Uno, dos, uno, dos, uno, dos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One, two! One, two! One, two!

CONTENT: いっちに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: One, two...

CONTENT: しまむらさんじゃないですかー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well, if it isn't Shimamura.

CONTENT: 何かご用ですか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did you need something?

CONTENT: 用はないけど...　というか 寒くないの?　こんな格好で
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No exactamente. ¿No tienes frío? Mira lo que llevas puesto.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not exactly. Or rather, aren't you cold? Look at what you're wearing.

CONTENT: わっ 冷たっ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Jeez, you're cold.

CONTENT: あんた 学校行かないの?　ハッハッハッ 何をおっしゃいますか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're not going to school? What are you talking about?

CONTENT: 私は 大人なのでそんなものないですー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Soy adulta, así que no tengo que ir.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm a fine adult, so I don't have to go!

CONTENT: 大人ねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: An adult, eh?

CONTENT: あんたその年から不登校なんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you're not showing up to school at that age,

CONTENT: 不良道 まっしぐらね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: te vas a convertir en una delincuente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: you're heading right down the path to becoming a delinquent.

CONTENT: ちなみに しまむらさん私は 680歳くらいですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Para que lo sepas, tengo unos 600 años.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll have you know, Shimamura, I'm around 680 years old.

CONTENT: はい はい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah, yeah.

CONTENT: じゃっ 私は学校だからじゃあね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La verdad es que yo sí que tengo clase, así que adiós.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Anyway, I actually have school, so see you later.

CONTENT: ばいばーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Bye-bye.

CONTENT: あー もう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, jeez...

CONTENT: この忍法は なかなか便利ですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esta técnica de ninja es muy útil.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This ninja art is quite useful.

CONTENT: 忍法?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ninja art?

CONTENT: 忍法 ジッと見て振り向かせるの術ニンニン
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Técnica: Hacer que alguien se dé la vuelta cuando le veas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ninja Art: Make Them Turn Around By Staring at Them. Nin, nin.

CONTENT: 忍法じゃなくて　私が すっげえいいヤツだから戻ってきただけ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: De técnica nada. He vuelto porque me considero buena persona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ninja art, my ass. I just came back because I'm a really good person.

CONTENT: そうですね しまむらさんはすっげえいいヤツですね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Claro, claro, eres una buena persona.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why, yesh. You sure are a good pershon, Shimamura.

CONTENT: そう 感謝しなさい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sí, así que dame las gracias.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes. So thank me.

CONTENT: 感謝ー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thank you!

CONTENT: 《距離を埋めたいなら自分から動こう》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si quieres acercarte, tendrás que dar tú el primer paso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If you want to get closer, you need to make the first move.

CONTENT: 《受け身は バツ!》
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You can't keep waiting forever!

CONTENT: はーい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Coming!

CONTENT: あなたは確か安達さんでしたね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, I believe your name was Adachi.

CONTENT: そうだけど えっと しまむらは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah... So, where's Shimamura?

CONTENT: えっ 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, what?

CONTENT: お昼寝をしていますは
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's taking a nap.

CONTENT: あっ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh?!

CONTENT: だから しーですよ しーっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So make sure you shh! Shh!

CONTENT: そうだ ちょうどいいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, perfect timing.

CONTENT: 私は そろそろ晩ご飯の確保に行かなければいけないのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Tengo que ir a por la cena.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I must go procure dinner soon.

CONTENT: のでここは お任せしましたー たー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por eso, te dejo encargada de esto...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And so, I leave this to you, you...

CONTENT: あれ 安達じゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh. Hey, Adachi.

CONTENT: し... しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sh-Shimamura...

CONTENT: で ヤシロは?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So where's Yashiro?

CONTENT: えっと 晩ご飯を確保しに行くって　ハハッ 気ままなヤツだな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dijo algo de ir a por la cena. Hace lo que le da la gana.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um... She said something about procuring dinner. She sure does whatever she wants to.

CONTENT: で 安達は何用?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So what brings you here, Adachi?

CONTENT: えっ 今日休んだから風邪でも引いたのかと思って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Bueno, como hoy no has ido a clase, creía que estarías resfriada...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Well, you weren't at school today, so I thought you maybe had a cold...

CONTENT: メールしたんだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I sent you a message.

CONTENT: メール?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A message?

CONTENT: ああ ごめん かばんに入れっぱなしだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, perdona, me he dejado el móvil en la mochila.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, sorry. I left it in my bag.

CONTENT: だから お見舞いだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: He venido a ver cómo estabas,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So that's why I came to see how you were doing,

CONTENT: 寝てるとこ 起こしちゃったかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero ya veo que te he despertado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but I guess I might've woken you up.

CONTENT: おっ 安達 超いいヤツ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're pretty decent, Adachi.

CONTENT: あっ ごめん つい...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, sorry. I just...

CONTENT: こういう姿を見ていると安達が私に何を求めているかが分かる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando se pone así, sé lo que quiere que haga.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When she looks like this, I can tell what Adachi wants from me.

CONTENT: 寄りかかって受け止めてくれるものだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Solo quiere algo en lo que apoyarse.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Something she can lean onto that'll support her.

CONTENT: それは以前体育館の壁だった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Antes solía ser la pared del gimnasio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Previously, it was the gym wall.

CONTENT: でも いつの間にかその対象が 私へと移っていた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero en algún punto pasé a ser yo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But at some point, that turned into me.

CONTENT: どうして そうなった?と思わないこともないが
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No es que no me pregunte a qué se debe,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's not like I don't wonder about why that is,

CONTENT: 今 安達とこうしていることこそが確かな事実なのかな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero lo que sí sé es que así puedo pasar tiempo con Adachi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but the fact of the matter is, I am indeed spending time with Adachi like this.

CONTENT: 今日のキーワードはA!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: La letra de la suerte de hoy es la A.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Today's lucky letter is A!

CONTENT: このキーワードの由来は私のご先祖　ひみ... 何だ ちょっ...　チョコ買い忘れんなよ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Mis ancestros me han dado esta letra de la suerte... ¡No os olvidéis de comprar chocolate!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This lucky letter was passed down from my great ancestor, Himi... Hey, wait... D-Don't forget to buy chocolates!

CONTENT: あっ そういえばチョコ 今日買わないと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ah, sí, hoy tengo que comprar chocolate.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah. I need to buy chocolate today.

CONTENT: 安達は まだ あそこに帰りたいと思っているかも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe Adachi wants to go back to that place.

CONTENT: だけど 今あの場所にこだわれば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But if we insisted on going to that place right now,

CONTENT: 私達は凍えて身動きが取れなくなってしまいそうな気がする
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: seguramente nos congelaríamos y no haríamos nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: we'd probably freeze and wouldn't be able to do anything.

CONTENT: 季節は巡る　私達も その流れに乗る
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Las estaciones cambian y nosotras cambiamos con ellas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: The seasons continue to change, and we go along for the ride.

CONTENT: それで いいと思う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No hay nada de malo en eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And I think that's fine.

CONTENT: 担々麺 半チャー お待ち!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Fideos dan dan y medio bol de arroz frito.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Dandan noodles and a half order of fried rice up.

CONTENT: ごめんね急にバイト入れちゃって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sorry to call you in suddenly.

CONTENT: あっ いえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No, it's fine...

CONTENT: でも どうしよう今日 チョコ買おうと思ってたのに
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Qué hago? Hoy tenía pensado comprar el chocolate.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What should I do though? I was planning on buying chocolate today.

CONTENT: もしもし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hello?

CONTENT: あっ しまちゃん　ごめん 突然
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, Shima? Sorry to call you out of the blue.

CONTENT: ううん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's fine.

CONTENT: えっと... 今 暇?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Um, are you free right now?

CONTENT: チョコ チョコしまむらへの チョコ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Chocolate... Chocolate... Chocolate for Shimamura.

CONTENT: あっ そうだ!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, right.

CONTENT: 明日 しまむらと出かけるからそこで一緒に選べば
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como mañana voy a salir con ella, podré comprarlo entonces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm going out with Shimamura tomorrow, so I guess I can just pick then.

CONTENT: ボッとすんなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wake up!

CONTENT: は... はい!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Y-Yes, ma'am!

CONTENT: 樽見
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Tarumi.

CONTENT: おっす
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heyo.

CONTENT: よっす
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Heya.

CONTENT: あだしまペディア 占い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adashimapedia: Fortunetelling.

CONTENT: 見えます あなたの未来が
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes, I see it! I see your future!

CONTENT: あー 日野にチューしようとしたのがバレちゃったか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Entonces habrás visto que voy a besarte.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess you figured out that I'm going to kiss you, then.

CONTENT: へっ そうなのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait, you are?

CONTENT: 占いだと 私はどこにチューするのかな?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, where does it say that I'm going to kiss you?

CONTENT: それは... おでこだろ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Well... The forehead, right?
